name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】この叫びを届けるためにｰScreamｰ【#常闇トワ2周年記念】 [YsvEWEEUWa8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Title card for 'Dreaming Days' appears with sparkles.
Transition from black to the 3D stage featuring AZKi, Roboco-san, Tokoyami Towa, and Momosuzu Nene.
MC section: The group celebrates Tokoyami Towa's 2nd anniversary and discusses the opening song.
MC section: Towa explains why she chose these specific members for the collaboration.
Song performance: 'Daily Diary' (でいり～だいあり～).

subtitles.original: え、可愛い、トワたち。
subtitles.english: Wow, you guys look so cute.

subtitles.original: え、可愛かった。
subtitles.english: That was so cute.

subtitles.original: 凄かった。
subtitles.english: It was amazing.

subtitles.original: トワ先輩、2周年、おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Towa-senpai, happy 2nd anniversary!

subtitles.original: 凄い、コラボ1発目にどエモいのを持ってきてしまいました。
subtitles.english: Wow, I brought something really emotional for the first collaboration.

subtitles.original: いやもう、クライマックス感、本当に、もうラストみたいな感じだったけどね、本当に。
subtitles.english: I mean, it felt like the climax, really, like it was already the finale.

subtitles.original: ラストみたいな響き、クライマックス感凄かった。
subtitles.english: It sounded like the finale, the climax feeling was incredible.

subtitles.original: なんか良いのかな、どうしようかなって思ったけど、やっぱりこういう1発目にボーン！っていうのを持ってきたら、
subtitles.english: I wondered if it was okay, but as expected, starting with a 'boom' like this...

subtitles.original: なんか、そんな1発目に選ばれちゃいました。
subtitles.english: We were chosen for the very first performance.

subtitles.original: 選ばれちゃった！嬉しい！
subtitles.english: We were chosen! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 呼んでくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting us!

subtitles.original: ちょっと不思議なメンバーじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't this a bit of an unusual lineup?

subtitles.original: このメンバーになった理由を。
subtitles.english: Tell us why you chose this lineup.

subtitles.original: まず、そう。AZKi先輩とは、本当に歌が凄い好きで、一緒に歌いたかったんだけど、やっぱり二人とかで歌うのはトワもドキドキしたし、
subtitles.english: First, well. I really love AZKi-senpai's singing and wanted to sing with her, but singing as a duo made me nervous...

subtitles.original: コラボとかも誘いたいときとか誘えないくらい、ちょっとドキドキしてたから、
subtitles.english: I was so nervous I couldn't even bring myself to invite her for a collab...

subtitles.original: 勇気を出して誘ってみて、
subtitles.english: So I plucked up the courage and asked her.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: で、あとは、ねねねとロボ子先輩は、周年配信とか、誕生日配信、記念配信の時に呼びたかったんだけど、
subtitles.english: And then, for Nene-ne and Roboco-senpai, I wanted to invite them for my anniversary and birthday streams before...

subtitles.original: それまでまだちょっと呼べてなかったから、今回、今日、一緒に歌いたいと思って。
subtitles.english: But I hadn't had the chance yet, so I really wanted us to sing together today.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！やっと呼ばれた！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Finally invited! Thank you!

subtitles.original: もう本当に、ハーモニーも凄く良かった。
subtitles.english: Really, the harmony was amazing as well.

subtitles.original: 良かったよね！凄く良かった。
subtitles.english: It was, wasn't it! It was so good.

subtitles.original: トワも、1曲目からエモすぎて、涙が出そうになっちゃって、
subtitles.english: I was getting so emotional from the very first song, I almost cried...

subtitles.original: 早い早い！
subtitles.english: Too early!

subtitles.original: 本当に幸せ者だなって、こんな祝ってもらえて。
subtitles.english: I feel so lucky to be celebrated like this.

subtitles.original: ゴンドラも凄かった！ゴンドラやばかった！眺めが良かった！
subtitles.english: The gondola was amazing! It was incredible! The view was great!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ良かったね。
subtitles.english: It was really great.

subtitles.original: あの、降りてくるところも凄く良かった。
subtitles.english: The part where we were descending was also great.

subtitles.original: 扉が開くところめちゃめちゃ可愛かった！二人ずつね。
subtitles.english: The part where the doors opened was so cute! Two at a time.

subtitles.original: そう、あれめっちゃ可愛かった、みんな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, everyone looked so cute there.

subtitles.original: これは、本当に皆さんのおかげです。
subtitles.english: This is all thanks to everyone.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！呼んでくれて！こちらこそありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for inviting us! No, thank YOU!

subtitles.original: でもね、最後、次もあるということで、
subtitles.english: But anyway, there's more coming up next...

subtitles.original: そうだ、まだ始まったばっかり！
subtitles.english: Right, it's only just begun!

subtitles.original: こんなエモいんだけど、始まったばっかりだから！
subtitles.english: It's already this emotional, but we're just getting started!

subtitles.original: まだまだあるから！
subtitles.english: There's still plenty more!

subtitles.original: この始まりの、写真も、こうやって撮って、
subtitles.english: Let's take a photo like this to mark the start...

subtitles.original: お別れします。
subtitles.english: We'll be heading off now.

subtitles.original: 集まれ集まれ！
subtitles.english: Get closer, get closer!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！この後もお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Please look forward to the rest!

subtitles.original: でいり～だいあり～　おぼえちゃおう
subtitles.english: Daily Diary, let's remember it

subtitles.original: 青春実況中　挑戦配信中
subtitles.english: Broadcasting youth live, streaming our challenges

subtitles.original: 青春実況中　挑戦配信中
subtitles.english: Broadcasting youth live, streaming our challenges

subtitles.original: ほらね、楽しいを　発見
subtitles.english: Look, I discovered fun

subtitles.original: また新しい「好き」が見つかったよ　なに、なに？超気になる！
subtitles.english: Found a new 'like' again. What, what? I'm so curious!

subtitles.original: 近所にできたカフェの　ケーキ
subtitles.english: The cake from the cafe that opened nearby

subtitles.original: なんか凄く美味しかったんだよ　これこれ！待ってたんだって！
subtitles.english: It was somehow really delicious. This is it! I was waiting for this!

subtitles.original: 知らなかったゲームや
subtitles.english: Games I didn't know

subtitles.original: 聴いたことない歌
subtitles.english: Songs I've never heard

subtitles.original: ちょっと気になったら手を伸ばそう
subtitles.english: If you're a bit curious, reach out your hand

subtitles.original: おいで、一緒に遊ぼう　（配信！）
subtitles.english: Come on, let's play together (Stream!)

subtitles.original: 充電器持ってきてみよう
subtitles.english: Let's try bringing a charger

subtitles.original: ホラーゲームやってみよう
subtitles.english: Let's try playing a horror game

subtitles.original: あの曲歌ってみよう　ぜんぶが、もう楽しいの！
subtitles.english: Let's try singing that song. Everything is already so fun!

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうの　笑顔に手を振っちゃう
subtitles.english: I wave my hand to the smiles across the window

subtitles.original: アニメ視聴中
subtitles.english: Watching anime

subtitles.original: 発見、モブのキャラに推せるポテンシャル　なんでも観てみるわ
subtitles.english: Discovery, a background character with potential. I'll watch anything.

subtitles.original: 積み上げた漫画や
subtitles.english: Piled up manga

subtitles.original: 思いついた新ネタ
subtitles.english: New gags I came up with

subtitles.original: 当たんない天気予報もきっと
subtitles.english: Even the weather forecast that doesn't hit

subtitles.original: 面白いことになるんだよ　（配信！）
subtitles.english: Will turn into something interesting (Stream!)

subtitles.original: 見て見て！今日の朝　目覚まし鳴らなくて
subtitles.english: Look, look! This morning, the alarm didn't go off

subtitles.original: 寝過ごしちゃったのは　昨晩の生放送！
subtitles.english: The reason I overslept was last night's live stream!

subtitles.original: 凄く楽しくて　寝付けなかったんだよ
subtitles.english: It was so fun that I couldn't fall asleep
